mapper.insert: insert into health(height, weight, goal, compare_weight, goal_week, kcal, protein, carb, fat) values(#{height}, #{weight}, #{goal}, #{compareWeight}, #{goalWeek}, #{kcal}, #{protein}, #{carb}, #{fat})
mapper.select: select height as height, weight as weight, goal as goal, compare_weight as compareWeight, goal_week as goalWeek, kcal as kcal, protein as protein, carb as carb, fat as fat, from health;
